text: Montmorin was a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. On 1 July 2017, it merged with Bruis and Sainte-Marie and is now part of the Valdoule commune. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D26 road passes through the commune. == References == Category:Former communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Montmorin, Hautes-Alpes
